title: Introduction to artfishr
text: R artfishr can installed Github. prequirements, packages remotes vrule installed. Package remotes can installed CRAN using: Package vrule installed GitHub using remotes: packages remotes vrule, R package artfishr can installed using: installed, artfishr can loaded using library(artfishr) `require(artfishr)``
code: install.packages("remotes", repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org") ## Installing package into '/home/runner/work/_temp/Library' ## (as 'lib' is unspecified) remotes::install_github("fdiwg/vrule") ## Using github PAT from envvar GITHUB_PAT. Use `gitcreds::gitcreds_set()` and unset GITHUB_PAT in .Renviron (or elsewhere) if you want to use the more secure git credential store instead. ## Skipping install of 'vrule' from a github remote, the SHA1 (3f4b5500) has not changed since last install. ##   Use `force = TRUE` to force installation remotes::install_github("fdiwg/artfishr") ## Using github PAT from envvar GITHUB_PAT. Use `gitcreds::gitcreds_set()` and unset GITHUB_PAT in .Renviron (or elsewhere) if you want to use the more secure git credential store instead. ## Downloading GitHub repo fdiwg/artfishr@HEAD ##  ## ── R CMD build ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ## * checking for file ‘/tmp/Rtmpxajac7/remotes1d3e24530b32/fdiwg-artfishr-ed09b32/DESCRIPTION’ ... OK ## * preparing ‘artfishr’: ## * checking DESCRIPTION meta-information ... title: Computes CPUE — compute_cpue
text: CPUE (Catch Per Unit Effort) computed landings, ratio nominal landed catches (catch_nominal_landed) effort fishing duration (effort_fishing_duration). computation performed grouped strata compound year, month fishing_unit. strata can extended additional columns minor_strata argument. Since landings give details data landed species, nominal landed catches sum grouped strata fishing trip get total nominal landed catches fishing trip. catch_nominal_landed effort_fishing_duration sum strata CPUE computed ratio sum. Note: Additional checks performed remove data NAs.

title: Computes CPUE — compute_cpue
code: compute_cpue(landings, minor_strata = NULL)

title: Computes CPUE — compute_cpue
text: landings landings minor_strata minor_strata. Default NULL

title: Computes CPUE — compute_cpue
text: tibble object giving CPUE strata

title: Computes effort activity coefficient — compute_effort_activity_coefficient
text: activity coefficient computed effort. Depending source effort data, source information used different: - case 'fisher_interview' coefficient activity computed ratio effort_fishing_duration effort_fishing_reference_period. - case 'boat_counting' coefficient activity computed ratio fleet_engagement_number fleet_engagement_max computation performed grouped strata compound minimum year, month fishing_unit. strata can extended adding one columns minor_strata argument. Note: Additional check performed remove data NAs, ensure data consistency

title: Computes effort activity coefficient — compute_effort_activity_coefficient
code: compute_effort_activity_coefficient(   effort,   effort_source = c("fisher_interview", "boat_counting"),   minor_strata = NULL )

title: Computes effort activity coefficient — compute_effort_activity_coefficient
text: effort effort data effort_source effort minor_strata minor_strata. Default NULL

title: Computes effort activity coefficient — compute_effort_activity_coefficient
text: tibble object giving activity coefficient strata

title: Computes nominal effort estimate — compute_effort_estimate
text: effort estimate computed product fleet_engagement_number (derived active_vessels), effort_fishable_duration (derivated active_days, effort_activity_coefficient computed compute_effort_activity_coefficient function. computation nominal effort estimate done grouped strata compound year, month fishing_unit. strata can extended additional columns minor_strata argument. Active vessels: active_vessels can either time-dependent,ie given year/month, year atemporal, mainly depending frequency vessels census/survey operated country. additional argument called active_vessels_strategy controls select  active_vessels data time, data time-dependent. latest strategy select latest data acquired time, closest select closest data acquired time, data acquired effort data considered. example, vessel census performed five years, data available 2007 2012. Effort data 2011 needs computed. active_vessels data used? case latest strategy, 2011, latest data available 2007, one used. case closest strategy, 2011, used closest vessel data (ie 2012), assuming betters characterizes fleet engagement year considered. Active days: case 'fisher_interview' (source effort data), active_days data ignored, days month used (generated automatically function)

title: Computes nominal effort estimate — compute_effort_estimate
code: compute_effort_estimate(   active_vessels,   active_vessels_strategy = c("latest", "closest"),   effort,   effort_source = c("fisher_interview", "boat_counting"),   active_days = NULL,   landings,   minor_strata = NULL )

title: Computes nominal effort estimate — compute_effort_estimate
text: active_vessels active vessels active_vessels_strategy strategy associate active vessels effort based time. Active vessels period match necessarily periods data (effort, landings), can reported either year year/month. parameter let decide methodology used select active vessels based time. can either "latest" (taking latest period), "closest" ie closest active vessels time, data period. case 2 periods /equally closer, latest time data period taken. effort effort data effort_source effort_source (register_interview / boat_counting) active_days active_days. Default NULL (auto-generated) landings landings minor_strata minor_strata. Default NULL

title: Select active vessels — select_active_vessels
text: Select active vessels selection years Active vessels: active_vessels can either time-dependent,ie given year/month, year atemporal, mainly depending frequency vessels census/survey operated country. additional argument called active_vessels_strategy controls select  active_vessels data time, data time-dependent. latest strategy select latest data acquired time, closest select closest data acquired time, data acquired effort data considered. example, vessel census performed five years, data available 2007 2012. Effort data 2011 needs computed. active_vessels data used? case latest strategy, 2011, latest data available 2007, one used. case closest strategy, 2011, used closest vessel data (ie 2012), assuming betters characterizes fleet engagement year considered.
